description: Metadata for an atom probe tomography or field ion microscopy experiment.

metaInfos.description: Name of the equipment, instrument with which the experiment was performed e.g. LEAP5000XS
metaInfos.name: experiment_tool_info

metaInfos.description: Operation mode of the instrument (APT, FIM or combination)
metaInfos.name: experiment_operation_method

metaInfos.description: Pulsing method to enforce a controlled ion evaporation sequence
metaInfos.name: experiment_imaging_method

metaInfos.description: Sample description e.g. pure W wire samples trial 2
metaInfos.name: specimen_description

metaInfos.description: Number of elements (disjoint element names) expected
metaInfos.name: number_of_elements

metaInfos.description: List of periodic table names expected contained in dataset
metaInfos.name: specimen_chemistry

metaInfos.description: Qualitative type of specimen and microstructure analyzed (e.g. thin films, nano objects, single crystal, polycrystal)
metaInfos.name: specimen_microstructure

metaInfos.description: Qualitative information how many phases in the specimen
metaInfos.name: specimen_constitution

metaInfos.description: Detector hit positions x and y
metaInfos.name: measured_detector_hit_pos
